member.name: ID3D12VideoMotionVectorHeap.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets the structure that was passed into when the was created.
member.returns: This method returns a D3D12_VIDEO_MOTION_VECTOR_HEAP_DESC structure.

member.name: ID3D12VideoMotionVectorHeap.GetProtectedResourceSession
member.summary: Gets the that was passed into when the was created.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.
Receives a void pointer representing the ID3D12ProtectedResourceSession interface.

member.name: ID3D12VideoMotionVectorHeap
member.summary: Represents the storage of the motion vector output of a motion estimation operation in an IHV-dependent layout. Call to calculate and store motion vectors. Use to copy and translate these results into the API-defined layout in a Texture 2D.
